blog.name: soldat-hail-hydra
blog.title: Bucky Fanfics
blog.description: For now I'm only doing Bucky fanfics but I'll probably open it up to other Avengers later on.

summary: Covert (Part 5)
title: Covert (Part 5)
body:
Summary: Your father was an Agent of Hydra. When Baron Strucker meets you as a child, he tells your father he wants to train you. Although your father doesn’t agree he is too scared to disagree and lets them. Little does he know your training partner is one of the most deadliest assassins. Years pass, and the Winter Soldier is now apart of the Avengers. You are the newest deadliest weapon of Hydra. And all Bucky can dream about is you.

Pairing: Bucky Barnes X Reader

Warnings: Violence, Swearing, Being Sick. 

A/n: I am really sorry this is so late coming out! I am getting back to writing usually now that life has calmed down a little

Covert Masterlist  » Part 1  »  Part 2  »  Part 3   »  Part 4   »   Part 5   » Part 6

The entire team sat there trying to take in the new information.

    “So you were in a Hydra Hunger Games?” Sam asks making Steve whack him shaking his head.

    “Hunger Games?” BUcky asks raising an eye brow.

    “Ignore him. Although we should watch that sometime.” Wanda states making the rest of the avengers nod.

    “So you helped her out and than what you ended up having to fight against you?” Tony asks making Bucky sigh.

    “That was the plan. But after she got wounded. Well_”

    You woke up with a fever. You could barely keep your eyes open. That’s when the door to your cell was thrown open.

    You attempted to get up but couldn’t. “Fire Scout. You need to get up and head to training.” When you didn’t stand up you felt a pair of arms grab your arm dragging you up. Your eyes opened but everything was blurry you looked at the guard who was forcing you up, than your eyes fell to the cell next door.

    You saw the Soldier watching you. He was just sitting there.

    Your eyes started to close again. That’s when a bucket of water was thrown at your face. You became more aware and a little more awake although you still felt the fever taking it’s tole on you.

    You were dragged out of your cell and into the training room where Strucker stood. “Fire Scout you disappointed me. But you and the Soldier are continuing to train together. Make sure I don’t find myself disappointed again.”

    Once Strucker finished his little speech. The door was opened. Faustus walked in the Winter Soldier falling behind him. His eyes landed on you.

    “Alright let’s begin shall we?” Faustus states walking over to Strucker.

    You were thrown onto the training mat, while the Soldier walked in his eyes studying you.

    “Fight!” they yelled. You attempted to fight but it seemed pointless. The Soldier sent a punch your way and you stumbled to block it barely missing his hand. Although you fumbled falling over.

    When you got back up your legs still felt weak. You raised your arms though sending a punch. Although it was weak and probably wouldn’t have knocked anything down.

“She’s not doing so well is she.” you heard Faustus state. It made your blood churn you could tell he had a smirk on his face.

You pulled out one of your Sai daggers attempting to try to salvage something from this fight. But before you could do anything, you stumbled forward. Soon you fell against his Metal arm that seemed to be the only thing to keep you up before you blacked out.

When you woke up you attempted to sit up only to feel weaker than usual.

You fell back into your bed groaning slightly. “You need to eat this.” you looked over to see the Soldier sitting by the bars next to your cell. He held up a bowl. You looked over seeing your own bowl sitting on the table next to your bed.

“It’s fine. I have my own.” you state trying to sit up.

“The amount of food they gave you won’t be enough.” you stared at him before sitting up slowly.

“Your going to need to eat too.” you say grabbing the bowl next to you. It was broth. You drank it quickly. Putting the bowl down and slowly laying back down.

“You need to eat more.” he says making you shake your head.

He stood up turning and looking at you.

“It’s fine the fever will pass it’s probably infected or something but don’t worry I’ll be fine.” you state giving him a small nod before you closed your eyes again.

Although you had hoped that the Fever would pass quickly it seemed only to get worse as time went by. You would go to training get your ass handed to you than come back and sleep. You weren’t getting better but than again you weren’t having much time to heal, and you were barely getting enough food to survive off of let alone heal from.

You had just gotten back from another training session when you laid down. You could feel your lip start to quiver. You felt like you were freezing cold.

Soon you heard your door open. You slowly opened your eyes only for them to open widely you watched as the Winter Soldier entered your cell. You got up as fast as you could although your body protested.

“Lay down.” he demanded.

“No I’m not going to let you hurt me.” you say getting into a fighting position although your legs shaked. Soon your felt yourself falling. But you never hit the ground the Soldier had caught you.

“You can’t be in here.” you say voice shaking while you shivered.

“Your burning up.” he stated laying you back down onto your bed. Your eyes started to droop although you forced them to stay open, “Don’t worry. Your going to be okay.”

The next time you woke up you felt something wet on your forehead. You frowned opening your eyes and lifting your hand to your head. You pulled off a wet rag.

You also looked over to see another bowl of broth. Although this time it had twice as much as normal. You looked around for the Soldier who seemed to be nowhere around.

You sat up slowly. Grabbing the bowl and spoon your slowly ate it this time.

When you were half way done your door opened and you felt yourself tense up. You looked up to see the Soldier walk in. He held out a bottle.

“Take this.” he states making you scowl slightly.

“Why do you want to poison me?” you asked. Making him look you straight in the eyes.

“IF I wanted you dead why would I give you my rations.” once he stated that you looked down at the bowl and your eyes widened. You put the bowl back down on the table.  “You need to finish that.” he stated making you shake your head. “I can’t eat it now because if I do I might get sick and you can’t afford to waste that food.”

You sighed knowing he was right. He grabbed your hand and put the bottle in it.

“Your fever went down_ for now.” he states turning around and walking out. Soon he entered his own cell, laying down on his bed and falling asleep.

You finished the broth and studied the bottle.

You didn’t trust it. You didn’t trust him. Nobody in Hydra was looking out for each other especially not the assassins that Hydra trains.

You put the bottle on the table laying back down and falling asleep.

When the next morning came you were woken up abruptly.

There was sweat drowning your back.

“Please follow me.” you got up and your legs shook a little but you followed.

You entered the arena and they put you into your cage. Soon Viper walked in she studied you before rolling her eyes.

Next Metalic who seemed to look at you and scoff. Lastly the Soldier walked in. He didn’t look at anybody. He walked into his area and leaned against the wall.

“Our next contest will be similar to the last. Each asset will be put into the arena and will have to fight off 8 agents. But this time there will be no guns. Although these agents have been specially trained to use knives and swords so it won’t be too hard for them.”

Soon Vipers gate opened. You watched her shootout but you couldn’t keep your eyes open for long. The next time you opened them she was back in her cage and Metallic was out there. You faded out again. When you opened them again the Soldier was just finishing fighting the agents. Walking over to his cage and walking in.

Soon your own gate opened. You stood up weakly.

You walked out stumbling forward slightly. The 8 agents walked in surrounding you.

“Fight!” they yelled and you found yourself going into fight or flight mode. You attempted to fend them off but was unable to. While you tried to stay alert an agent came behind you kicking in your legs from behind. You fell onto your knees. Scrambling to get up.

Although you were knocked down again. This time from a punch in the stomach you let out a cough before getting up again. Your vision began to blur.

Soon there was another hit right on your shoulder. You let out a scream as the bullet wound seemed to be set on fire.

The next moment you heard a loud crash.

And suddenly all the agents around you were away from you. You looked over to see the Soldier had broken out of his cage and into the arena. His gate had been taken off cleanly. Now lying on the other side of the arena. He fought each agent until they were either on the ground in pain or knocked out.

Everybody had gone silent. You looked up at the balcony to see all of them standing up in shock. You looked over at Strucker who seemed to be scowling. But then you looked over at Faustus. WHo to yoru surprise was smirking down at you.

“That was_ very interesting.” he states 


Covert: 
@imboredsueme @writingsleepless @writing-in-winter @slender–spirit

You faded out again. When you opened them again the Soldier was just finishing fighting the agents. Walking over to his cage and walking in.

Soon your own gate opened. You stood up weakly.

You walked out stumbling forward slightly. The 8 agents walked in surrounding you.

“Fight!” they yelled and you found yourself going into fight or flight mode. You attempted to fend them off but was unable to. While you tried to stay alert an agent came behind you kicking in your legs from behind. You fell onto your knees. Scrambling to get up.

Although you were knocked down again. This time from a punch in the stomach you let out a cough before getting up again. Your vision began to blur.

Soon there was another hit right on your shoulder. You let out a scream as the bullet wound seemed to be set on fire.

The next moment you heard a loud crash.

And suddenly all the agents around you were away from you. You looked over to see the Soldier had broken out of his cage and into the arena. His gate had been taken off cleanly. Now lying on the other side of the arena. He fought each agent until they were either on the ground in pain or knocked out.

Everybody had gone silent. You looked up at the balcony to see all of them standing up in shock. You looked over at Strucker who seemed to be scowling. But then you looked over at Faustus. WHo to yoru surprise was smirking down at you.

“That was_ very interesting.” he states 


Covert: 
@imboredsueme @writingsleepless @writing-in-winter @slender–spirit
trail.content:
Summary: Your father was an Agent of Hydra. When Baron Strucker meets you as a child, he tells your father he wants to train you. Although your father doesn’t agree he is too scared to disagree and lets them. Little does he know your training partner is one of the most deadliest assassins. Years pass, and the Winter Soldier is now apart of the Avengers. You are the newest deadliest weapon of Hydra. And all Bucky can dream about is you.

Pairing: Bucky Barnes X Reader

Warnings: Violence, Swearing, Being Sick. 

A/n: I am really sorry this is so late coming out! I am getting back to writing usually now that life has calmed down a little

Covert Masterlist  » Part 1  »  Part 2  »  Part 3   »  Part 4   »   Part 5   » Part 6

The entire team sat there trying to take in the new information.

    “So you were in a Hydra Hunger Games?” Sam asks making Steve whack him shaking his head.

    “Hunger Games?” BUcky asks raising an eye brow.

    “Ignore him. Although we should watch that sometime.” Wanda states making the rest of the avengers nod.

    “So you helped her out and than what you ended up having to fight against you?” Tony asks making Bucky sigh.

    “That was the plan. But after she got wounded. Well_”

    You woke up with a fever. You could barely keep your eyes open. That’s when the door to your cell was thrown open.

    You attempted to get up but couldn’t. “Fire Scout. You need to get up and head to training.” When you didn’t stand up you felt a pair of arms grab your arm dragging you up. Your eyes opened but everything was blurry you looked at the guard who was forcing you up, than your eyes fell to the cell next door.

    You saw the Soldier watching you. He was just sitting there.

    Your eyes started to close again. That’s when a bucket of water was thrown at your face. You became more aware and a little more awake although you still felt the fever taking it’s tole on you.

    You were dragged out of your cell and into the training room where Strucker stood. “Fire Scout you disappointed me. But you and the Soldier are continuing to train together. Make sure I don’t find myself disappointed again.”

    Once Strucker finished his little speech. The door was opened. Faustus walked in the Winter Soldier falling behind him. His eyes landed on you.

    “Alright let’s begin shall we?” Faustus states walking over to Strucker.

    You were thrown onto the training mat, while the Soldier walked in his eyes studying you.

    “Fight!” they yelled. You attempted to fight but it seemed pointless. The Soldier sent a punch your way and you stumbled to block it barely missing his hand. Although you fumbled falling over.

    When you got back up your legs still felt weak. You raised your arms though sending a punch. Although it was weak and probably wouldn’t have knocked anything down.

“She’s not doing so well is she.” you heard Faustus state. It made your blood churn you could tell he had a smirk on his face.

You pulled out one of your Sai daggers attempting to try to salvage something from this fight. But before you could do anything, you stumbled forward. Soon you fell against his Metal arm that seemed to be the only thing to keep you up before you blacked out.

When you woke up you attempted to sit up only to feel weaker than usual.

You fell back into your bed groaning slightly. “You need to eat this.” you looked over to see the Soldier sitting by the bars next to your cell. He held up a bowl. You looked over seeing your own bowl sitting on the table next to your bed.

“It’s fine. I have my own.” you state trying to sit up.

“The amount of food they gave you won’t be enough.” you stared at him before sitting up slowly.

“Your going to need to eat too.” you say grabbing the bowl next to you. It was broth. You drank it quickly. Putting the bowl down and slowly laying back down.

“You need to eat more.” he says making you shake your head.

He stood up turning and looking at you.

“It’s fine the fever will pass it’s probably infected or something but don’t worry I’ll be fine.” you state giving him a small nod before you closed your eyes again.

Although you had hoped that the Fever would pass quickly it seemed only to get worse as time went by. You would go to training get your ass handed to you than come back and sleep. You weren’t getting better but than again you weren’t having much time to heal, and you were barely getting enough food to survive off of let alone heal from.

You had just gotten back from another training session when you laid down. You could feel your lip start to quiver. You felt like you were freezing cold.

Soon you heard your door open. You slowly opened your eyes only for them to open widely you watched as the Winter Soldier entered your cell. You got up as fast as you could although your body protested.

“Lay down.” he demanded.

“No I’m not going to let you hurt me.” you say getting into a fighting position although your legs shaked. Soon your felt yourself falling. But you never hit the ground the Soldier had caught you.

“You can’t be in here.” you say voice shaking while you shivered.

“Your burning up.” he stated laying you back down onto your bed. Your eyes started to droop although you forced them to stay open, “Don’t worry. Your going to be okay.”

The next time you woke up you felt something wet on your forehead. You frowned opening your eyes and lifting your hand to your head. You pulled off a wet rag.

You also looked over to see another bowl of broth. Although this time it had twice as much as normal. You looked around for the Soldier who seemed to be nowhere around.

You sat up slowly. Grabbing the bowl and spoon your slowly ate it this time.

When you were half way done your door opened and you felt yourself tense up. You looked up to see the Soldier walk in. He held out a bottle.

“Take this.” he states making you scowl slightly.

“Why do you want to poison me?” you asked. Making him look you straight in the eyes.

“IF I wanted you dead why would I give you my rations.” once he stated that you looked down at the bowl and your eyes widened. You put the bowl back down on the table.  “You need to finish that.” he stated making you shake your head. “I can’t eat it now because if I do I might get sick and you can’t afford to waste that food.”

You sighed knowing he was right. He grabbed your hand and put the bottle in it.

“Your fever went down_ for now.” he states turning around and walking out. Soon he entered his own cell, laying down on his bed and falling asleep.

You finished the broth and studied the bottle.

You didn’t trust it. You didn’t trust him. Nobody in Hydra was looking out for each other especially not the assassins that Hydra trains.

You put the bottle on the table laying back down and falling asleep.

When the next morning came you were woken up abruptly.

There was sweat drowning your back.

“Please follow me.” you got up and your legs shook a little but you followed.

You entered the arena and they put you into your cage. Soon Viper walked in she studied you before rolling her eyes.

Next Metalic who seemed to look at you and scoff. Lastly the Soldier walked in. He didn’t look at anybody. He walked into his area and leaned against the wall.

“Our next contest will be similar to the last. Each asset will be put into the arena and will have to fight off 8 agents. But this time there will be no guns. Although these agents have been specially trained to use knives and swords so it won’t be too hard for them.”

Soon Vipers gate opened. You watched her shootout but you couldn’t keep your eyes open for long. The next time you opened them she was back in her cage and Metallic was out there. You faded out again. When you opened them again the Soldier was just finishing fighting the agents. Walking over to his cage and walking in.

Soon your own gate opened. You stood up weakly.

You walked out stumbling forward slightly. The 8 agents walked in surrounding you.

“Fight!” they yelled and you found yourself going into fight or flight mode. You attempted to fend them off but was unable to. While you tried to stay alert an agent came behind you kicking in your legs from behind. You fell onto your knees. Scrambling to get up.

Although you were knocked down again. This time from a punch in the stomach you let out a cough before getting up again. Your vision began to blur.

Soon there was another hit right on your shoulder. You let out a scream as the bullet wound seemed to be set on fire.

The next moment you heard a loud crash.

And suddenly all the agents around you were away from you. You looked over to see the Soldier had broken out of his cage and into the arena. His gate had been taken off cleanly. Now lying on the other side of the arena. He fought each agent until they were either on the ground in pain or knocked out.

Everybody had gone silent. You looked up at the balcony to see all of them standing up in shock. You looked over at Strucker who seemed to be scowling. But then you looked over at Faustus. WHo to yoru surprise was smirking down at you.

“That was_ very interesting.” he states

@imboredsueme @writingsleepless @writing-in-winter @slender–spirit

summary: Venom: Riz Ahmed parla del suo personaggio
title: Venom: Riz Ahmed parla del suo personaggio
body:
Venom: Riz Ahmed parla del suo personaggio

Durante il panel al Comic-Con di Venom non è stato mostrato nessun trailer nuovo, anche se in compenso abbiamo potuto vedere il simbionte in un’immagine a dir poco straordinaria, ma comunque nuove e interessanti informazioni sono giunte dalla celebre fiera. In particolare è stato l’attore britannico di origini pakistane Riz Ahmed, che ha parlato del personaggio che interpreta nel cinecomic,…

tags: twitter is news now i guess
summary: Disney Should Know the Difference Between James Gunn and Roseanne
title: Disney Should Know the Difference Between James Gunn and Roseanne
excerpt: In firing Gunn, Disney’s equating the merely tasteless with the actually dangerous.
description: We live in an era in which any insistence that two things with surface similarities are in fact different is met with instant, ill-informed charges of hypocrisy. But a joke — even a thousand creepy jokes that you wouldn’t tell at a dinner table, in a locker room, or anywhere else — is not the same thing as the public stereotyping or vilification of groups that are already widely targeted with discrimination and hatred. Sarah Silverman’s “I want to get an abortion but my boyfriend and I are having difficulty conceiving,” is not an attack on babies, as much as Ted Cruz would probably want to prosecute her for conspiracy to commit murder. Nor does it equal Roseanne Barr calling George Soros a Nazi “who turned his fellow Jews in 2 be murdered … and stole their wealth.” One is a jab; one is a libel (one for which Barr later apologized). What the alt-right wants is to gerrymander the racist, the hateful, the defamatory, and the outright menacing into the same district as the merely tasteless, in the hope that the left will shrug in resignation and sigh, “Okay, we give, maybe it’s all merely tasteless.” But it’s not.

reblog.comment: We live in an era in which any insistence that two things with surface similarities are in fact different is met with instant, ill-informed charges of hypocrisy. But a joke — even a thousand creepy jokes that you wouldn’t tell at a dinner table, in a locker room, or anywhere else — is not the same thing as the public stereotyping or vilification of groups that are already widely targeted with discrimination and hatred. Sarah Silverman’s “I want to get an abortion but my boyfriend and I are having difficulty conceiving,” is not an attack on babies, as much as Ted Cruz would probably want to prosecute her for conspiracy to commit murder. Nor does it equal Roseanne Barr calling George Soros a Nazi “who turned his fellow Jews in 2 be murdered … and stole their wealth.” One is a jab; one is a libel (one for which Barr later apologized). What the alt-right wants is to gerrymander the racist, the hateful, the defamatory, and the outright menacing into the same district as the merely tasteless, in the hope that the left will shrug in resignation and sigh, “Okay, we give, maybe it’s all merely tasteless.” But it’s not.

But a joke — even a thousand creepy jokes that you wouldn’t tell at a dinner table, in a locker room, or anywhere else — is not the same thing as the public stereotyping or vilification of groups that are already widely targeted with discrimination and hatred. Sarah Silverman’s “I want to get an abortion but my boyfriend and I are having difficulty conceiving,” is not an attack on babies, as much as Ted Cruz would probably want to prosecute her for conspiracy to commit murder. Nor does it equal Roseanne Barr calling George Soros a Nazi “who turned his fellow Jews in 2 be murdered … and stole their wealth.” One is a jab; one is a libel (one for which Barr later apologized). What the alt-right wants is to gerrymander the racist, the hateful, the defamatory, and the outright menacing into the same district as the merely tasteless, in the hope that the left will shrug in resignation and sigh, “Okay, we give, maybe it’s all merely tasteless.” But it’s not.

But a joke — even a thousand creepy jokes that you wouldn’t tell at a dinner table, in a locker room, or anywhere else — is not the same thing as the public stereotyping or vilification of groups that are already widely targeted with discrimination and hatred. Sarah Silverman’s “I want to get an abortion but my boyfriend and I are having difficulty conceiving,” is not an attack on babies, as much as Ted Cruz would probably want to prosecute her for conspiracy to commit murder. Nor does it equal Roseanne Barr calling George Soros a Nazi “who turned his fellow Jews in 2 be murdered … and stole their wealth.” One is a jab; one is a libel (one for which Barr later apologized). What the alt-right wants is to gerrymander the racist, the hateful, the defamatory, and the outright menacing into the same district as the merely tasteless, in the hope that the left will shrug in resignation and sigh, “Okay, we give, maybe it’s all merely tasteless.” But it’s not.

summary: “Daughter of the Faltine”  Clea’s true form, half-Faltine, half-Mhuruuk. She usually keeps the shape of a 20-30 years old woman,...
caption:
“Daughter of the Faltine”

Clea’s true form, half-Faltine, half-Mhuruuk. She usually keeps the shape of a 20-30 years old woman, her “true” form has been seen only once in the comics and she seemed made of purple fire or magic energy like Domammu.

summary: Cubicles
title: Cubicles
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JOksPh

by Loran_Arameri

After the Illumnati and Sue Storm have captured Steve, they put him in the glass cube next to Tony, instead of trying to work with him.

Words: 2344, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel 616
